Client

Klient je konsolová aplikace sloužící pro přístup ke vzdálenému úložišti. Klient komunikuje se serverem a to vždy stylem dotaz odpověď. Komunikaci vždy zahajuje klient. Jak klientskou aplikaci používat vysvětluje kapitola Začínáme.

class client.Client

Bases: object

Implementation of a Kryzbu client (Cryptographically Secure Storage).

Global variables in this class:
SERVER_IP (str) – IPv4 address where server is hosted
SERVER_PORT (int) – port where server is hosted
EOM (str) – End of Message sign, should be same as in server.py, helps in byte stream signaling
USER_CONF (Path) – defines where to store user specific configuration
SERVER_PUBLIC_KEY (Path) – defines where to store server public key
USER_AES_KEY_BASE_PATH (Path) – defines where to store user specific AES key (Session ID)
static change_user()

Starts interatcive login for new user.

async static download(file_name: str)

Downloads file from server. Requires only file name.

Parameters

file_path (str) – File name

static flush_key()

Function to delete downloaded server public key.

static get_download_folder() → str

Get location of download folder from User config file. User can choose where to store downloaded files from server in /_data/config/user.conf. This function loads this information.

Returns

Download folder location

Return type

str

async static get_server_publickey()

Requests public key from server and saves it to filesystem.

static get_username() → str

Get user name of current account. Current account and preferences are stored in /_data/config/user.conf.

Returns

User name of current account.

Return type

str

static info()

Print out information about user account and client preferences. All information stored in /_data/config/user.conf.

static init() → None

Initialize client. Check for correct folder tree and fix it respectively.

client/
└── _data/
├── config/
└── keys/
async static list_files(detailed: bool)

Prints list of files available to the loged in user. Detailed view can be triggered by bool setting.

Parameters

detailed (bool) – Detailed view

static load_aes_key() → bytes

Function for loading user’s AES key from file.

Returns

AES key in bytes

Return type

bytes

async static login()

If no user is loged in, start interative console login.

static online_operation(online) → None

Function that prepares client for online communication with server. Checks user information and folder structure. Obtains server public key.

Parameters

detailed (bool) – Requires operation to be online?

async static open_connection() → Tuple

Open SSL connection to the Kryzbu server and return Reader and Writer objects for managing communication. Connection is asyncio stream with SSL context. This function is called at the beggining of each request made to server. SSL now uses self-signed certificate for localhost. If client and server are not at the same machine PKI has to be managed.

Returns

Reader and Writer objects.

Return type

Tuple: (reader, writer)

async static remove(file_name: str)

Removes file from server. File must be acessible to currently loged in user.

Parameters

file_name (str) – File name

static send_request(type: str, writer: asyncio.streams.StreamWriter, file_name: str = 'empty') → None

A function that provides easy sending of requests to the server by entering the type and file name to which it applies.

Parameters

type (str) – Type of request. (UPLOAD, DOWNLOAD etc.)

static set_download_folder(folder_path: str)

Set folder location for files to be downloaded from server. This information is stored in /_data/config/user.conf file.

Parameters

folder_path (str) – Path to new download folder.

async static upload(file_path: str)

Uploads file to server. Requires only file path to file to be uploaded.

Parameters

file_path (str) – File to path asi String

static user_exists()

Checks if some user is currently loged in.

static version()

Print out information about client application.
